name: Transient - A Good Omen's Fangame
description:
I am Oemuff and mostly do illustrations over at Instagram. 

But the RPG maker sparked my interest a while ago and now I am working on

Transient.

 

It will be a short RPG about Crowley and Aziraphale's life after the 

ruined armageddon.  Expect cute/weird humor, an established relationship and 

some vague hints at NSFW-content! This is- more or less- a playable fanfiction.

I would say I am about half-finished with the game, but you can download the  demo and give it a try! If you want you can push a dollar my way after you played the demo. But please do not feel obligated to do so before! Please press "skip" to not donate. Then the download will start.

The downloadable demo is optimized for Windows! You can play it on a Mac OS system by using wineHQ.

I used most of the assets from RPGmaker MV, but edited a few and added some of my own. The charakter-sprites and expressions are made by me, so are the Illustrations throughout the game.

If you notice any glitches or errors throughout the demo, please contact me! I will be ever so grateful and patch them up right away.

Also: If you are a fan-artist or fanfiction-author and would like to be featured in the game, please contact me! I would love to build-in a few references or pictures : )

Good Omens is a miniseries based on the 1990 novel of the same name by Terry Pratchett and Neil Gaiman. I do not own the characters.
